name: adwarp
author: AFNI Team
description: Resamples a 'data parent' dataset to the grid defined by an 'anat parent' dataset.

inputs.description: Set the data parent dataset (nonoptional). dset may contain a sub-brick selector, e.g., -dpar 'dset+orig[2,5,7]'
inputs.name: Data parent dataset

inputs.description: Set the prefix for the output dataset. Default is the prefix of 'dset'.
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Set the grid spacing in the output dataset. Default is 1 mm.
inputs.name: Grid spacing

inputs.description: Write out result even if it means deleting an existing dataset. Default is not to overwrite.
inputs.name: Force overwrite

inputs.description: Set resampling mode for all sub-bricks. Modes: NN (Nearest Neighbor), Li (Linear Interpolation), Cu (Cubic Interpolation), Bk (Blocky Interpolation). Default is Li for all sub-bricks.
inputs.name: Resampling mode

inputs.description: Set resampling mode for threshold sub-bricks. Modes: NN (Nearest Neighbor), Li (Linear Interpolation), Cu (Cubic Interpolation), Bk (Blocky Interpolation).
inputs.name: Threshold resampling mode

inputs.description: Set resampling mode for functional sub-bricks. Modes: NN (Nearest Neighbor), Li (Linear Interpolation), Cu (Cubic Interpolation), Bk (Blocky Interpolation).
inputs.name: Functional resampling mode
